vim-options.allowrevins.description: allow CTRL-_ in Insert mode. (Vim option: 'allowrevins', short: 'ari')

vim-options.ambiwidth.description: what to do with Unicode chars of ambiguous width. (Vim option: 'ambiwidth', short: 'ambw')

vim-options.arabic.description: for Arabic as a default second language. (Vim option: 'arabic', short: 'arab')

vim-options.arabicshape.description: do shaping for Arabic characters. (Vim option: 'arabicshape', short: 'arshape')

vim-options.autochdir.description: change directory to the file in the current window. (Vim option: 'autochdir', short: 'acd')

vim-options.autoindent.description: take indent for new line from previous line. (Vim option: 'autoindent', short: 'ai')

vim-options.autoread.description: autom. read file when changed outside of Vim. (Vim option: 'autoread', short: 'ar')

vim-options.autowrite.description: automatically write file if changed. (Vim option: 'autowrite', short: 'aw')

vim-options.autowriteall.description: as 'autowrite', but works with more commands. (Vim option: 'autowriteall', short: 'awa')

vim-options.background.description: "dark" or "light", used for highlight colors. (Vim option: 'background', short: 'bg')

vim-options.backspace.description: how backspace works at start of line. (Vim option: 'backspace', short: 'bs')

vim-options.backup.description: keep backup file after overwriting a file. (Vim option: 'backup', short: 'bk')

vim-options.backupcopy.description: make backup as a copy, don't rename the file. (Vim option: 'backupcopy', short: 'bkc')

vim-options.backupdir.description: list of directories for the backup file. (Vim option: 'backupdir', short: 'bdir')

vim-options.backupext.description: extension used for the backup file. (Vim option: 'backupext', short: 'bex')

vim-options.backupskip.description: no backup for files that match these patterns. (Vim option: 'backupskip', short: 'bsk')

vim-options.belloff.description: do not ring the bell for these reasons. (Vim option: 'belloff', short: 'bo')

vim-options.binary.description: read/write/edit file in binary mode. (Vim option: 'binary', short: 'bin')

vim-options.bomb.description: prepend a Byte Order Mark to the file. (Vim option: 'bomb', short: 'bomb')

vim-options.breakat.description: characters that may cause a line break. (Vim option: 'breakat', short: 'brk')

vim-options.breakindent.description: wrapped line repeats indent. (Vim option: 'breakindent', short: 'bri')

vim-options.browsedir.description: which directory to start browsing in. (Vim option: 'browsedir', short: 'bsdir')

vim-options.bufhidden.description: what to do when buffer is no longer in window. (Vim option: 'bufhidden', short: 'bh')

vim-options.buflisted.description: whether the buffer shows up in the buffer list. (Vim option: 'buflisted', short: 'bl')

vim-options.buftype.description: special type of buffer. (Vim option: 'buftype', short: 'bt')

vim-options.casemap.description: specifies how case of letters is changed. (Vim option: 'casemap', short: 'cmp')

vim-options.cdhome.description: change directory to the home directory by ":cd". (Vim option: 'cdhome', short: 'cdh')

vim-options.cdpath.description: list of directories searched with ":cd". (Vim option: 'cdpath', short: 'cd')

vim-options.cedit.description: key used to open the command-line window. (Vim option: 'cedit', short: 'cedit')

vim-options.charconvert.description: expression for character encoding conversion. (Vim option: 'charconvert', short: 'ccv')

vim-options.chistory.description: maximum number of quickfix lists in history. (Vim option: 'chistory', short: 'chi')

vim-options.cindent.description: do C program indenting. (Vim option: 'cindent', short: 'cin')

vim-options.cinkeys.description: keys that trigger indent when 'cindent' is set. (Vim option: 'cinkeys', short: 'cink')

vim-options.cinoptions.description: how to do indenting when 'cindent' is set. (Vim option: 'cinoptions', short: 'cino')

vim-options.cinscopedecls.description: words that are recognized by 'cino-g'. (Vim option: 'cinscopedecls', short: 'cinsd')

vim-options.cinwords.description: words where 'si' and 'cin' add an indent. (Vim option: 'cinwords', short: 'cinw')

vim-options.clipboard.description: use the clipboard as the unnamed register. (Vim option: 'clipboard', short: 'cb')

vim-options.cmdheight.description: number of lines to use for the command-line. (Vim option: 'cmdheight', short: 'ch')

vim-options.cmdwinheight.description: height of the command-line window. (Vim option: 'cmdwinheight', short: 'cwh')

vim-options.columns.description: number of columns in the display. (Vim option: 'columns', short: 'co')

vim-options.comments.description: patterns that can start a comment line. (Vim option: 'comments', short: 'com')

vim-options.commentstring.description: template for comments; used for fold marker. (Vim option: 'commentstring', short: 'cms')

vim-options.complete.description: specify how Insert mode completion works. (Vim option: 'complete', short: 'cpt')

vim-options.completefunc.description: function to be used for Insert mode completion. (Vim option: 'completefunc', short: 'cfu')

vim-options.completeopt.description: options for Insert mode completion. (Vim option: 'completeopt', short: 'cot')

vim-options.concealcursor.description: whether concealable text is hidden in cursor line. (Vim option: 'concealcursor', short: 'cocu')

vim-options.conceallevel.description: whether concealable text is shown or hidden. (Vim option: 'conceallevel', short: 'cole')

vim-options.confirm.description: ask what to do about unsaved/read-only files. (Vim option: 'confirm', short: 'cf')

vim-options.copyindent.description: make 'autoindent' use existing indent structure. (Vim option: 'copyindent', short: 'ci')

vim-options.cpoptions.description: flags for Vi-compatible behavior. (Vim option: 'cpoptions', short: 'cpo')

vim-options.cursorbind.description: move cursor in window as it moves in other windows. (Vim option: 'cursorbind', short: 'crb')

vim-options.cursorcolumn.description: highlight the screen column of the cursor. (Vim option: 'cursorcolumn', short: 'cuc')

vim-options.cursorline.description: highlight the screen line of the cursor. (Vim option: 'cursorline', short: 'cul')

vim-options.debug.description: set to "msg" to see all error messages. (Vim option: 'debug', short: 'debug')

vim-options.define.description: pattern to be used to find a macro definition. (Vim option: 'define', short: 'def')

vim-options.delcombine.description: delete combining characters on their own. (Vim option: 'delcombine', short: 'deco')

vim-options.dictionary.description: list of file names used for keyword completion. (Vim option: 'dictionary', short: 'dict')

vim-options.diff.description: use diff mode for the current window. (Vim option: 'diff', short: 'diff')

vim-options.diffexpr.description: expression used to obtain a diff file. (Vim option: 'diffexpr', short: 'dex')

vim-options.diffopt.description: options for using diff mode. (Vim option: 'diffopt', short: 'dip')

vim-options.digraph.description: enable the entering of digraphs in Insert mode. (Vim option: 'digraph', short: 'dg')

vim-options.directory.description: list of directory names for the swap file. (Vim option: 'directory', short: 'dir')

vim-options.display.description: list of flags for how to display text. (Vim option: 'display', short: 'dy')

vim-options.eadirection.description: in which direction 'equalalways' works. (Vim option: 'eadirection', short: 'ead')

vim-options.endoffile.description: write CTRL-Z at end of the file. (Vim option: 'endoffile', short: 'eof')

vim-options.endofline.description: write <EOL> for last line in file. (Vim option: 'endofline', short: 'eol')

vim-options.equalalways.description: windows are automatically made the same size. (Vim option: 'equalalways', short: 'ea')

vim-options.equalprg.description: external program to use for "=" command. (Vim option: 'equalprg', short: 'ep')

vim-options.errorbells.description: ring the bell for error messages. (Vim option: 'errorbells', short: 'eb')

vim-options.errorfile.description: name of the errorfile for the QuickFix mode. (Vim option: 'errorfile', short: 'ef')

vim-options.errorformat.description: description of the lines in the error file. (Vim option: 'errorformat', short: 'efm')

vim-options.eventignore.description: autocommand events that are ignored. (Vim option: 'eventignore', short: 'ei')

vim-options.eventignorewin.description: autocommand events that are ignored in a window. (Vim option: 'eventignorewin', short: 'eiw')

vim-options.expandtab.description: use spaces when <Tab> is inserted. (Vim option: 'expandtab', short: 'et')

vim-options.exrc.description: read init files in the current directory. (Vim option: 'exrc', short: 'ex')

vim-options.fileencoding.description: file encoding for multibyte text. (Vim option: 'fileencoding', short: 'fenc')

vim-options.fileencodings.description: automatically detected character encodings. (Vim option: 'fileencodings', short: 'fencs')

vim-options.fileformat.description: file format used for file I/O. (Vim option: 'fileformat', short: 'ff')

vim-options.fileformats.description: automatically detected values for 'fileformat'. (Vim option: 'fileformats', short: 'ffs')

vim-options.fileignorecase.description: ignore case when using file names. (Vim option: 'fileignorecase', short: 'fic')

vim-options.filetype.description: type of file, used for autocommands. (Vim option: 'filetype', short: 'ft')

vim-options.fillchars.description: characters to use for displaying special items. (Vim option: 'fillchars', short: 'fcs')

vim-options.findfunc.description: function to be called for the |:find| command. (Vim option: 'findfunc', short: 'ffu')

vim-options.fixendofline.description: make sure last line in file has <EOL>. (Vim option: 'fixendofline', short: 'fixeol')

vim-options.foldclose.description: close a fold when the cursor leaves it. (Vim option: 'foldclose', short: 'fcl')

vim-options.foldcolumn.description: width of the column used to indicate folds. (Vim option: 'foldcolumn', short: 'fdc')

vim-options.foldenable.description: set to display all folds open. (Vim option: 'foldenable', short: 'fen')

vim-options.foldexpr.description: expression used when 'foldmethod' is "expr". (Vim option: 'foldexpr', short: 'fde')

vim-options.foldignore.description: ignore lines when 'foldmethod' is "indent". (Vim option: 'foldignore', short: 'fdi')

vim-options.foldlevel.description: close folds with a level higher than this. (Vim option: 'foldlevel', short: 'fdl')

vim-options.foldlevelstart.description: 'foldlevel' when starting to edit a file. (Vim option: 'foldlevelstart', short: 'fdls')

vim-options.foldmarker.description: markers used when 'foldmethod' is "marker". (Vim option: 'foldmarker', short: 'fmr')

vim-options.foldminlines.description: minimum number of lines for a fold to be closed. (Vim option: 'foldminlines', short: 'fml')

vim-options.foldopen.description: for which commands a fold will be opened. (Vim option: 'foldopen', short: 'fdo')

vim-options.foldtext.description: expression used to display for a closed fold. (Vim option: 'foldtext', short: 'fdt')

vim-options.formatexpr.description: expression used with "gq" command. (Vim option: 'formatexpr', short: 'fex')

vim-options.formatlistpat.description: pattern used to recognize a list header. (Vim option: 'formatlistpat', short: 'flp')

vim-options.formatoptions.description: how automatic formatting is to be done. (Vim option: 'formatoptions', short: 'fo')

vim-options.formatprg.description: name of external program used with "gq" command. (Vim option: 'formatprg', short: 'fp')

vim-options.fsync.description: whether to invoke fsync() after file write. (Vim option: 'fsync', short: 'fs')

vim-options.gdefault.description: the ":substitute" flag 'g' is default on. (Vim option: 'gdefault', short: 'gd')

vim-options.grepprg.description: program to use for ":grep". (Vim option: 'grepprg', short: 'gp')

vim-options.guicursor.description: GUI: settings for cursor shape and blinking. (Vim option: 'guicursor', short: 'gcr')

vim-options.guifont.description: GUI: Name(s) of font(s) to be used. (Vim option: 'guifont', short: 'gfn')

vim-options.guifontwide.description: list of font names for double-wide characters. (Vim option: 'guifontwide', short: 'gfw')

vim-options.guioptions.description: GUI: Which components and options are used. (Vim option: 'guioptions', short: 'go')

vim-options.guitablabel.description: GUI: custom label for a tab page. (Vim option: 'guitablabel', short: 'gtl')

vim-options.guitabtooltip.description: GUI: custom tooltip for a tab page. (Vim option: 'guitabtooltip', short: 'gtt')

vim-options.helpfile.description: full path name of the main help file. (Vim option: 'helpfile', short: 'hf')

vim-options.helpheight.description: minimum height of a new help window. (Vim option: 'helpheight', short: 'hh')

vim-options.hidden.description: don't unload buffer when it is |abandon|ed. (Vim option: 'hidden', short: 'hid')

vim-options.history.description: number of command-lines that are remembered. (Vim option: 'history', short: 'hi')

vim-options.hlsearch.description: highlight matches with last search pattern. (Vim option: 'hlsearch', short: 'hls')

vim-options.icon.description: let Vim set the text of the window icon. (Vim option: 'icon', short: 'icon')

vim-options.iconstring.description: string to use for the Vim icon text. (Vim option: 'iconstring', short: 'iconstring')

vim-options.ignorecase.description: ignore case in search patterns. (Vim option: 'ignorecase', short: 'ic')

vim-options.imcmdline.description: use IM when starting to edit a command line. (Vim option: 'imcmdline', short: 'imc')

vim-options.imdisable.description: do not use the IM in any mode. (Vim option: 'imdisable', short: 'imd')

vim-options.iminsert.description: use :lmap or IM in Insert mode. (Vim option: 'iminsert', short: 'imi')

vim-options.imsearch.description: use :lmap or IM when typing a search pattern. (Vim option: 'imsearch', short: 'ims')

vim-options.include.description: pattern to be used to find an include file. (Vim option: 'include', short: 'inc')

vim-options.includeexpr.description: expression used to process an include line. (Vim option: 'includeexpr', short: 'inex')

vim-options.incsearch.description: highlight match while typing search pattern. (Vim option: 'incsearch', short: 'is')

vim-options.indentexpr.description: expression used to obtain the indent of a line. (Vim option: 'indentexpr', short: 'inde')

vim-options.indentkeys.description: keys that trigger indenting with 'indentexpr'. (Vim option: 'indentkeys', short: 'indk')

vim-options.infercase.description: adjust case of match for keyword completion. (Vim option: 'infercase', short: 'inf')

vim-options.isfname.description: characters included in file names and pathnames. (Vim option: 'isfname', short: 'isf')

vim-options.isident.description: characters included in identifiers. (Vim option: 'isident', short: 'isi')

vim-options.iskeyword.description: characters included in keywords. (Vim option: 'iskeyword', short: 'isk')

vim-options.joinspaces.description: two spaces after a period with a join command. (Vim option: 'joinspaces', short: 'js')

vim-options.jumpoptions.description: specifies how jumping is done. (Vim option: 'jumpoptions', short: 'jop')

vim-options.keymap.description: name of a keyboard mapping. (Vim option: 'keymap', short: 'kmp')

vim-options.keymodel.description: enable starting/stopping selection with keys. (Vim option: 'keymodel', short: 'km')

vim-options.keywordprg.description: program to use for the "K" command. (Vim option: 'keywordprg', short: 'kp')

vim-options.langmap.description: alphabetic characters for other language mode. (Vim option: 'langmap', short: 'lmap')

vim-options.langmenu.description: language to be used for the menus. (Vim option: 'langmenu', short: 'lm')

vim-options.langremap.description: do apply 'langmap' to mapped characters. (Vim option: 'langremap', short: 'lrm')

vim-options.laststatus.description: tells when last window has status lines. (Vim option: 'laststatus', short: 'ls')

vim-options.lazyredraw.description: don't redraw while executing macros. (Vim option: 'lazyredraw', short: 'lz')

vim-options.lhistory.description: maximum number of location lists in history. (Vim option: 'lhistory', short: 'lhi')

vim-options.linebreak.description: wrap long lines at a blank. (Vim option: 'linebreak', short: 'lbr')

vim-options.lines.description: number of lines in the display. (Vim option: 'lines', short: 'lines')

vim-options.linespace.description: number of pixel lines to use between characters. (Vim option: 'linespace', short: 'lsp')

vim-options.lisp.description: automatic indenting for Lisp. (Vim option: 'lisp', short: 'lisp')

vim-options.lispoptions.description: changes how Lisp indenting is done. (Vim option: 'lispoptions', short: 'lop')

vim-options.lispwords.description: words that change how lisp indenting works. (Vim option: 'lispwords', short: 'lw')

vim-options.listchars.description: characters for displaying in list mode. (Vim option: 'listchars', short: 'lcs')

vim-options.loadplugins.description: load plugin scripts when starting up. (Vim option: 'loadplugins', short: 'lpl')

vim-options.magic.description: changes special characters in search patterns. (Vim option: 'magic', short: 'magic')

vim-options.makeef.description: name of the errorfile for ":make". (Vim option: 'makeef', short: 'mef')

vim-options.makeencoding.description: encoding of external make/grep commands. (Vim option: 'makeencoding', short: 'menc')

vim-options.makeprg.description: program to use for the ":make" command. (Vim option: 'makeprg', short: 'mp')

vim-options.matchpairs.description: pairs of characters that "%" can match. (Vim option: 'matchpairs', short: 'mps')

vim-options.matchtime.description: tenths of a second to show matching paren. (Vim option: 'matchtime', short: 'mat')

vim-options.maxcombine.description: maximum nr of combining characters displayed. (Vim option: 'maxcombine', short: 'mco')

vim-options.maxfuncdepth.description: maximum recursive depth for user functions. (Vim option: 'maxfuncdepth', short: 'mfd')

vim-options.maxmapdepth.description: maximum recursive depth for mapping. (Vim option: 'maxmapdepth', short: 'mmd')

vim-options.maxmempattern.description: maximum memory (in Kbyte) used for pattern search. (Vim option: 'maxmempattern', short: 'mmp')

vim-options.menuitems.description: maximum number of items in a menu. (Vim option: 'menuitems', short: 'mis')

vim-options.mkspellmem.description: memory used before |:mkspell| compresses the tree. (Vim option: 'mkspellmem', short: 'msm')

vim-options.modeline.description: recognize modelines at start or end of file. (Vim option: 'modeline', short: 'ml')

vim-options.modelineexpr.description: allow setting expression options from a modeline. (Vim option: 'modelineexpr', short: 'mle')

vim-options.modelines.description: number of lines checked for modelines. (Vim option: 'modelines', short: 'mls')

vim-options.modifiable.description: changes to the text are not possible. (Vim option: 'modifiable', short: 'ma')

vim-options.modified.description: buffer has been modified. (Vim option: 'modified', short: 'mod')

vim-options.more.description: pause listings when the whole screen is filled. (Vim option: 'more', short: 'more')

vim-options.mouse.description: enable the use of mouse clicks. (Vim option: 'mouse', short: 'mouse')

vim-options.mousefocus.description: keyboard focus follows the mouse. (Vim option: 'mousefocus', short: 'mousef')

vim-options.mousehide.description: hide mouse pointer while typing. (Vim option: 'mousehide', short: 'mh')

vim-options.mousemodel.description: changes meaning of mouse buttons. (Vim option: 'mousemodel', short: 'mousem')

vim-options.mousemoveevent.description: report mouse moves with <MouseMove>. (Vim option: 'mousemoveevent', short: 'mousemev')

vim-options.mousescroll.description: amount to scroll by when scrolling with a mouse. (Vim option: 'mousescroll', short: 'mousescroll')

vim-options.mouseshape.description: shape of the mouse pointer in different modes. (Vim option: 'mouseshape', short: 'mouses')

vim-options.mousetime.description: max time between mouse double-click. (Vim option: 'mousetime', short: 'mouset')

vim-options.nrformats.description: number formats recognized for CTRL-A command. (Vim option: 'nrformats', short: 'nf')

vim-options.number.description: print the line number in front of each line. (Vim option: 'number', short: 'nu')

vim-options.numberwidth.description: number of columns used for the line number. (Vim option: 'numberwidth', short: 'nuw')

vim-options.omnifunc.description: function for filetype-specific completion. (Vim option: 'omnifunc', short: 'ofu')

vim-options.opendevice.description: allow reading/writing devices on MS-Windows. (Vim option: 'opendevice', short: 'odev')

vim-options.operatorfunc.description: function to be called for |g@| operator. (Vim option: 'operatorfunc', short: 'opfunc')

vim-options.packpath.description: list of directories used for packages. (Vim option: 'packpath', short: 'pp')

vim-options.paragraphs.description: nroff macros that separate paragraphs. (Vim option: 'paragraphs', short: 'para')

vim-options.patchexpr.description: expression used to patch a file. (Vim option: 'patchexpr', short: 'pex')

vim-options.patchmode.description: keep the oldest version of a file. (Vim option: 'patchmode', short: 'pm')

vim-options.path.description: list of directories searched with "gf" et.al.. (Vim option: 'path', short: 'pa')

vim-options.preserveindent.description: preserve the indent structure when reindenting. (Vim option: 'preserveindent', short: 'pi')

vim-options.previewheight.description: height of the preview window. (Vim option: 'previewheight', short: 'pvh')

vim-options.previewwindow.description: identifies the preview window. (Vim option: 'previewwindow', short: 'pvw')

vim-options.pumheight.description: maximum number of items to show in the popup menu. (Vim option: 'pumheight', short: 'ph')

vim-options.pumwidth.description: minimum width of the popup menu. (Vim option: 'pumwidth', short: 'pw')

vim-options.pyxversion.description: Python version used for pyx* commands. (Vim option: 'pyxversion', short: 'pyx')

vim-options.quoteescape.description: escape characters used in a string. (Vim option: 'quoteescape', short: 'qe')

vim-options.readonly.description: disallow writing the buffer. (Vim option: 'readonly', short: 'ro')

vim-options.redrawtime.description: timeout for 'hlsearch' and |:match| highlighting. (Vim option: 'redrawtime', short: 'rdt')

vim-options.regexpengine.description: default regexp engine to use. (Vim option: 'regexpengine', short: 're')

vim-options.relativenumber.description: show relative line number in front of each line. (Vim option: 'relativenumber', short: 'rnu')

vim-options.report.description: threshold for reporting nr. of lines changed. (Vim option: 'report', short: 'report')

vim-options.revins.description: inserting characters will work backwards. (Vim option: 'revins', short: 'ri')

vim-options.rightleft.description: window is right-to-left oriented. (Vim option: 'rightleft', short: 'rl')

vim-options.rightleftcmd.description: commands for which editing works right-to-left. (Vim option: 'rightleftcmd', short: 'rlc')

vim-options.ruler.description: show cursor line and column in the status line. (Vim option: 'ruler', short: 'ru')

vim-options.rulerformat.description: custom format for the ruler. (Vim option: 'rulerformat', short: 'ruf')

vim-options.runtimepath.description: list of directories used for runtime files. (Vim option: 'runtimepath', short: 'rtp')

vim-options.scroll.description: lines to scroll with CTRL-U and CTRL-D. (Vim option: 'scroll', short: 'scr')

vim-options.scrollbind.description: scroll in window as other windows scroll. (Vim option: 'scrollbind', short: 'scb')

vim-options.scrolljump.description: minimum number of lines to scroll. (Vim option: 'scrolljump', short: 'sj')

vim-options.scrolloff.description: minimum nr. of lines above and below cursor. (Vim option: 'scrolloff', short: 'so')

vim-options.sections.description: nroff macros that separate sections. (Vim option: 'sections', short: 'sect')

vim-options.secure.description: secure mode for reading .vimrc in current dir. (Vim option: 'secure', short: 'secure')

vim-options.selection.description: what type of selection to use. (Vim option: 'selection', short: 'sel')

vim-options.selectmode.description: when to use Select mode instead of Visual mode. (Vim option: 'selectmode', short: 'slm')

vim-options.shada.description: use |shada| file upon startup and exiting. (Vim option: 'shada', short: 'sd')

vim-options.shell.description: name of shell to use for external commands. (Vim option: 'shell', short: 'sh')

vim-options.shellcmdflag.description: flag to shell to execute one command. (Vim option: 'shellcmdflag', short: 'shcf')

vim-options.shellpipe.description: string to put output of ":make" in error file. (Vim option: 'shellpipe', short: 'sp')

vim-options.shellquote.description: quote character(s) for around shell command. (Vim option: 'shellquote', short: 'shq')

vim-options.shellredir.description: string to put output of filter in a temp file. (Vim option: 'shellredir', short: 'srr')

vim-options.shellslash.description: use forward slash for shell file names. (Vim option: 'shellslash', short: 'ssl')

vim-options.shelltemp.description: whether to use a temp file for shell commands. (Vim option: 'shelltemp', short: 'stmp')

vim-options.shellxescape.description: characters to escape when 'shellxquote' is (. (Vim option: 'shellxescape', short: 'sxe')

vim-options.shellxquote.description: like 'shellquote', but include redirection. (Vim option: 'shellxquote', short: 'sxq')

vim-options.shiftround.description: round indent to multiple of shiftwidth. (Vim option: 'shiftround', short: 'sr')

vim-options.shiftwidth.description: number of spaces to use for (auto)indent step. (Vim option: 'shiftwidth', short: 'sw')

vim-options.shortmess.description: list of flags, reduce length of messages. (Vim option: 'shortmess', short: 'shm')

vim-options.showbreak.description: string to use at the start of wrapped lines. (Vim option: 'showbreak', short: 'sbr')

vim-options.showcmdloc.description: where to show (partial) command. (Vim option: 'showcmdloc', short: 'sloc')

vim-options.showfulltag.description: show full tag pattern when completing tag. (Vim option: 'showfulltag', short: 'sft')

vim-options.showmatch.description: briefly jump to matching bracket if insert one. (Vim option: 'showmatch', short: 'sm')

vim-options.showmode.description: message on status line to show current mode. (Vim option: 'showmode', short: 'smd')

vim-options.showtabline.description: tells when the tab pages line is displayed. (Vim option: 'showtabline', short: 'stal')

vim-options.sidescroll.description: minimum number of columns to scroll horizontal. (Vim option: 'sidescroll', short: 'ss')

vim-options.sidescrolloff.description: min. nr. of columns to left and right of cursor. (Vim option: 'sidescrolloff', short: 'siso')

vim-options.signcolumn.description: when and how to display the sign column. (Vim option: 'signcolumn', short: 'scl')

vim-options.smartcase.description: no ignore case when pattern has uppercase. (Vim option: 'smartcase', short: 'scs')

vim-options.smartindent.description: smart autoindenting for C programs. (Vim option: 'smartindent', short: 'si')

vim-options.smoothscroll.description: scroll by screen lines when 'wrap' is set. (Vim option: 'smoothscroll', short: 'sms')

vim-options.softtabstop.description: number of spaces that <Tab> uses while editing. (Vim option: 'softtabstop', short: 'sts')

vim-options.spellcapcheck.description: pattern to locate end of a sentence. (Vim option: 'spellcapcheck', short: 'spc')

vim-options.spellfile.description: files where |zg| and |zw| store words. (Vim option: 'spellfile', short: 'spf')

vim-options.spelllang.description: language(s) to do spell checking for. (Vim option: 'spelllang', short: 'spl')

vim-options.spelloptions.description: options for spell checking. (Vim option: 'spelloptions', short: 'spo')

vim-options.spellsuggest.description: method(s) used to suggest spelling corrections. (Vim option: 'spellsuggest', short: 'sps')

vim-options.splitbelow.description: new window from split is below the current one. (Vim option: 'splitbelow', short: 'sb')

vim-options.splitkeep.description: determines scroll behavior for split windows. (Vim option: 'splitkeep', short: 'spk')

vim-options.splitright.description: new window is put right of the current one. (Vim option: 'splitright', short: 'spr')

vim-options.startofline.description: commands move cursor to first non-blank in line. (Vim option: 'startofline', short: 'sol')

vim-options.statuscolumn.description: custom format for the status column. (Vim option: 'statuscolumn', short: 'stc')

vim-options.statusline.description: custom format for the status line. (Vim option: 'statusline', short: 'stl')

vim-options.suffixes.description: suffixes that are ignored with multiple match. (Vim option: 'suffixes', short: 'su')

vim-options.suffixesadd.description: suffixes added when searching for a file. (Vim option: 'suffixesadd', short: 'sua')

vim-options.swapfile.description: whether to use a swapfile for a buffer. (Vim option: 'swapfile', short: 'swf')

vim-options.switchbuf.description: sets behavior when switching to another buffer. (Vim option: 'switchbuf', short: 'swb')

vim-options.synmaxcol.description: maximum column to find syntax items. (Vim option: 'synmaxcol', short: 'smc')

vim-options.syntax.description: syntax to be loaded for current buffer. (Vim option: 'syntax', short: 'syn')

vim-options.tabclose.description: which tab page to focus when closing a tab. (Vim option: 'tabclose', short: 'tcl')

vim-options.tabline.description: custom format for the console tab pages line. (Vim option: 'tabline', short: 'tal')

vim-options.tabpagemax.description: maximum number of tab pages for |-p| and "tab all". (Vim option: 'tabpagemax', short: 'tpm')

vim-options.tabstop.description: number of spaces that <Tab> in file uses. (Vim option: 'tabstop', short: 'ts')

vim-options.tagbsearch.description: use binary searching in tags files. (Vim option: 'tagbsearch', short: 'tbs')

vim-options.tagcase.description: how to handle case when searching in tags files. (Vim option: 'tagcase', short: 'tc')

vim-options.tagfunc.description: function to get list of tag matches. (Vim option: 'tagfunc', short: 'tfu')

vim-options.taglength.description: number of significant characters for a tag. (Vim option: 'taglength', short: 'tl')

vim-options.tagrelative.description: file names in tag file are relative. (Vim option: 'tagrelative', short: 'tr')

vim-options.tags.description: list of file names used by the tag command. (Vim option: 'tags', short: 'tag')

vim-options.tagstack.description: push tags onto the tag stack. (Vim option: 'tagstack', short: 'tgst')

vim-options.term.description: name of the terminal. (Vim option: 'term', short: 'term')

vim-options.termbidi.description: terminal takes care of bi-directionality. (Vim option: 'termbidi', short: 'tbidi')

vim-options.termguicolors.description: enable 24-bit RGB color in the TUI. (Vim option: 'termguicolors', short: 'tgc')

vim-options.textwidth.description: maximum width of text that is being inserted. (Vim option: 'textwidth', short: 'tw')

vim-options.thesaurus.description: list of thesaurus files for keyword completion. (Vim option: 'thesaurus', short: 'tsr')

vim-options.thesaurusfunc.description: function to be used for thesaurus completion. (Vim option: 'thesaurusfunc', short: 'tsrfu')

vim-options.tildeop.description: tilde command "~" behaves like an operator. (Vim option: 'tildeop', short: 'top')

vim-options.timeout.description: time out on mappings and key codes. (Vim option: 'timeout', short: 'to')

vim-options.timeoutlen.description: time out time in milliseconds. (Vim option: 'timeoutlen', short: 'tm')

vim-options.title.description: let Vim set the title of the window. (Vim option: 'title', short: 'title')

vim-options.titlelen.description: percentage of 'columns' used for window title. (Vim option: 'titlelen', short: 'titlelen')

vim-options.titleold.description: old title, restored when exiting. (Vim option: 'titleold', short: 'titleold')

vim-options.titlestring.description: string to use for the Vim window title. (Vim option: 'titlestring', short: 'titlestring')

vim-options.ttimeout.description: time out on mappings. (Vim option: 'ttimeout', short: 'ttimeout')

vim-options.ttimeoutlen.description: time out time for key codes in milliseconds. (Vim option: 'ttimeoutlen', short: 'ttm')

vim-options.undodir.description: where to store undo files. (Vim option: 'undodir', short: 'udir')

vim-options.undofile.description: save undo information in a file. (Vim option: 'undofile', short: 'udf')

vim-options.undolevels.description: maximum number of changes that can be undone. (Vim option: 'undolevels', short: 'ul')

vim-options.undoreload.description: max nr of lines to save for undo on a buffer reload. (Vim option: 'undoreload', short: 'ur')

vim-options.updatecount.description: after this many characters flush swap file. (Vim option: 'updatecount', short: 'uc')

vim-options.updatetime.description: after this many milliseconds flush swap file. (Vim option: 'updatetime', short: 'ut')

vim-options.varsofttabstop.description: a list of number of spaces when typing <Tab>. (Vim option: 'varsofttabstop', short: 'vsts')

vim-options.vartabstop.description: a list of number of spaces for <Tab>s. (Vim option: 'vartabstop', short: 'vts')

vim-options.verbosefile.description: file to write messages in. (Vim option: 'verbosefile', short: 'vfile')

vim-options.viewdir.description: directory where to store files with :mkview. (Vim option: 'viewdir', short: 'vdir')

vim-options.viewoptions.description: specifies what to save for :mkview. (Vim option: 'viewoptions', short: 'vop')

vim-options.virtualedit.description: when to use virtual editing. (Vim option: 'virtualedit', short: 've')

vim-options.visualbell.description: use visual bell instead of beeping. (Vim option: 'visualbell', short: 'vb')

vim-options.warn.description: warn for shell command when buffer was changed. (Vim option: 'warn', short: 'warn')

vim-options.whichwrap.description: allow specified keys to cross line boundaries. (Vim option: 'whichwrap', short: 'ww')

vim-options.wildchar.description: command-line character for wildcard expansion. (Vim option: 'wildchar', short: 'wc')

vim-options.wildcharm.description: like 'wildchar' but also works when mapped. (Vim option: 'wildcharm', short: 'wcm')

vim-options.wildignore.description: files matching these patterns are not completed. (Vim option: 'wildignore', short: 'wig')

vim-options.wildignorecase.description: ignore case when completing file names. (Vim option: 'wildignorecase', short: 'wic')

vim-options.wildmenu.description: use menu for command line completion. (Vim option: 'wildmenu', short: 'wmnu')

vim-options.wildmode.description: mode for 'wildchar' command-line expansion. (Vim option: 'wildmode', short: 'wim')

vim-options.wildoptions.description: specifies how command line completion is done. (Vim option: 'wildoptions', short: 'wop')

vim-options.winaltkeys.description: when the windows system handles ALT keys. (Vim option: 'winaltkeys', short: 'wak')

vim-options.window.description: nr of lines to scroll for CTRL-F and CTRL-B. (Vim option: 'window', short: 'wi')

vim-options.winfixbuf.description: keep window focused on a single buffer. (Vim option: 'winfixbuf', short: 'wfb')

vim-options.winfixheight.description: keep window height when opening/closing windows. (Vim option: 'winfixheight', short: 'wfh')

vim-options.winfixwidth.description: keep window width when opening/closing windows. (Vim option: 'winfixwidth', short: 'wfw')

vim-options.winheight.description: minimum number of lines for the current window. (Vim option: 'winheight', short: 'wh')

vim-options.winminheight.description: minimum number of lines for any window. (Vim option: 'winminheight', short: 'wmh')

vim-options.winminwidth.description: minimal number of columns for any window. (Vim option: 'winminwidth', short: 'wmw')

vim-options.winwidth.description: minimal number of columns for current window. (Vim option: 'winwidth', short: 'wiw')

vim-options.wrap.description: long lines wrap and continue on the next line. (Vim option: 'wrap', short: 'wrap')

vim-options.wrapmargin.description: chars from the right where wrapping starts. (Vim option: 'wrapmargin', short: 'wm')

vim-options.wrapscan.description: searches wrap around the end of the file. (Vim option: 'wrapscan', short: 'ws')

vim-options.write.description: writing to a file is allowed. (Vim option: 'write', short: 'write')

vim-options.writeany.description: write to file with no need for "!" override. (Vim option: 'writeany', short: 'wa')

vim-options.writebackup.description: make a backup before overwriting a file. (Vim option: 'writebackup', short: 'wb')

vim-options.writedelay.description: delay this many msec for each char (for debug). (Vim option: 'writedelay', short: 'wd')
